name: Brazen
description:
Brazen is a first person game with puzzle focused combat where players learn through trial by death to kill a seemingly undefeatable undead minotaur. Players must learn to use tools they wield and the minotaurs own attacks to drop the minotaur into a bottomless abyss. Players play as an ancient warrior wielding a crossbow and a sword and must use their maneuverability to avoid the minotaurs attacks while lighting torches to signal walls to lower.
